title: Can't unlock the Omega Squad Veteran Icon
body:
Whenever I try I get a "REDEEM FAILED!" notification.
https://i.gyazo.com/ce77cacf3c042610e0af8f4d1b714bfe.png

Despite what it says at the top with "Has been permanently added to your inventory"......
https://i.gyazo.com/e19de0e8ea9374ad4c5e0866ad6054ea.png

I've restarted my client like it says, but nothing happened. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: This issue was happening yesterday morning, and I'm looking into the possibility of it happening again.  Have you since restarted your client?  Try that, and let me know if this is still an issue.
Still getting the error for now, I'll wait until this resolves before trying again.
